i1.name: Ravenous_Flock
description: {{sbc|Innate - Ravenous:}} '''Swain''' can periodically target a nearby {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} enemy {{tip|champion}} to rip out a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} from them, dealing {{as|{{pp|20 to 105}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them 290-units towards him over a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time. If the target would be brought past '''Swain''', they are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} the excess distance.
'''Swain''' cannot use ''Ravenous'' while unable to cast abilities.
Enemy champions also leave behind a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} for 16 seconds upon their {{tip|death}}, which can be harvested after 1 second if '''Swain''' is near them.

{{sbc|Innate - Flock:}} '''Swain's''' ravens bring nearby {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} to him, {{tip|healing}} him for {{as|{{pp|key=%|4 to 7 for 3|1 to 11}} of his '''maximum''' health}}. Each {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} collected increases his {{as|'''maximum''' health by 5}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Ravenous: Swain can periodically target a nearby immobilized enemy champion to rip out a Soul Fragment from them, dealing 20 − 105 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) magic damage and pulling them 290-units towards him over a 0.25-second cast time. If the target would be brought past Swain, they are instead knocked back the excess distance.
Swain cannot use Ravenous while unable to cast abilities.
Enemy champions also leave behind a Soul Fragment for 16 seconds upon their death, which can be harvested after 1 second if Swain is near them.
Innate - Flock: Swain's ravens bring nearby Soul Fragments to him, healing him for 1 to 11 ‒ undefined of his maximum health. Each Soul Fragment collected increases his maximum health by 5.
i1.notes:
* ''Ravenous Flock's'' {{tip|airborne|pull}} requires the target to be {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an {{tt|enemy source|from the target's perspective}}.
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} do not allow ''Ravenous Flock'' to cast against the champion. Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** ''Ravenous Flock'' can be used against {{tip|cc-immune}} or {{tip|displacement immune}} targets that are affected by an ongoing {{tip|immobilize|immobilization}}. This will apply the damage, but the target will be prevented from being {{tip|airborne|pulled}}.
* The crows carrying the souls will only be seen by the enemies if they have {{tip|sight|vision}} of '''Swain'''.
* The pull will interrupt {{tip|channel|channels}} at the very beginning, but does not keep the target stunned for the rest of the movement.
** {{tip|channel|Channels}} can be started successfully during the pull, provided the previous crowd control does not prevent them still.

q1.name: Death's_Hand
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' unleashes five bolts of eldritch power in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within. Enemies can be hit by multiple bolts, taking {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Swain unleashes five bolts of eldritch power in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies within. Enemies can be hit by multiple bolts, taking bonus magic damage.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|55 to 135}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage Per Bolt|{{ap|15 to 35}}%|Maximum Damage|{{ap|(55 to 135)*(1+(15 to 35)*4/100)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40*(1+(15 to 35)*4/100)}}% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Death's Hand'' will still cast and deal damage if '''Swain''' dies during the cast time.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* The total damage to a single target will be split evenly among each bolt that hits, meaning that hitting with more bolts will deal less damage per hit (but more overall damage).<!-- this needs to be tested with some flat reduction effect since it doesn't seem to be 100% true. It's likely it deals damage in multiple instances but the first instance should deal more than the others, instead of an even split of the damage-->
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block all bolts.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
  • Bonus Magic Damage Per Bolt: %
  • Maximum Damage: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input% AP)

st_slices: Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input (+ Error: SyntaxError: Unexpected end of input% AP)

w1.name: Vision_of_Empire
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' summons a demonic eye at the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for 2 seconds and exploding after {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within, halved against {{tip|minions}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
Enemy champions struck are also {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} for a duration and have a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}} ripped from them.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Swain summons a demonic eye at the target location, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds and exploding after 1.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to all enemies within, halved against minions, and slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
Enemy champions struck are also revealed for a duration and have a Soul Fragment ripped from them.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|80/2 to 240/2}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow Strength|{{ap|25 to 65}}%}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Swain''' from ripping a {{as|Soul Fragment|buzzword3}}.
* ''Vision of Empire'' will also grant {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} from hitting {{tip|clone|clones}}.
* '''Swain''' will not receive the {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}} if ''Vision of Empire'' hits enemy champions while he is dead.
* ''Vision of Empire'' is visible and audible to enemies through the [[sight|fog of war]].
* Hitting an enemy champion with ''Vision of Empire'' collects nearby {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 35% AP)
  • Slow Strength: %

e1.name: Nevermove
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' launches a demonic wave in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through.

Upon reaching its maximum distance, the wave returns to '''Swain''', detonating at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Swain launches a demonic wave in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies it passes through.
Upon reaching its maximum distance, the wave returns to Swain, detonating at the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and rooting them for 1.5 seconds.
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} block either the pass-through or the detonation, not both.
{{Effect at cast time start}}

effects.str:
• Detonation Damage: (+ 25% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 50% AP)

r1.name: Demonic_Ascension
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' frees the demon within for 12 seconds, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, gaining {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}} and doubling the health gained from {{as|Soul Fragments|buzzword3}}.

While ''Demonic Ascension'' is active, '''Swain''' drains the lifeforce of all nearby enemies, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} each second and {{tip|healing}} himself each second per target affected. The heal is reduced by 90% against {{tip|minion|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Swain''' can end ''Demonic Ascension's'' effects early to cast {{ai|Demonflare|Swain}}, and automatically does so at the end of its duration.
''The targets do not have to be {{tip|sight|visible}} to be affected by this ability.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Swain frees the demon within for 12 seconds, becoming ghosted, gaining bonus health and doubling the health gained from Soul Fragments.
While Demonic Ascension is active, Swain drains the lifeforce of all nearby enemies, dealing them magic damage each second and healing himself each second per target affected. The heal is reduced by 90% against minions and monsters.
After a 0.5-second delay, Swain can end Demonic Ascension's effects early to cast Swain's Demonflare, and automatically does so at the end of its duration.
The targets do not have to be visible to be affected by this ability.
leveling:
{{st|Damage per Tick|{{ap|420/12 to 780/12}} {{as|(+ {{fd|14.167}}% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|420 to 780}} {{as|(+ 170% AP)}}}}
{{st|Heal per Tick|{{ap|20 to 50}} {{as|(+ 16% AP)}}|Reduced Healing|{{ap|20*0.1 to 50*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Champion Heal|{{ap|20*12 to 50*12}} {{as|(+ 192% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Non-Champion Heal|{{ap|20*12*0.1 to 50*12*0.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|19.2}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* '''Swain''' can still move during ''Demonic Ascension's'' cast time.
[[File: Swain_-_R|center]]

effects.str:
• Damage per Tick: (+ 14.167% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 170% AP)
  • Heal per Tick: (+ 16% AP)
  • Reduced Healing: (+ 1.6% AP)
  • Maximum Single-Champion Heal: (+ 192% AP)
  • Maximum Single-Non-Champion Heal: (+ 19.2% AP)

r2.name: Demonflare
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Swain''' releases a nova of energy, dealing a base amount of {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies plus {{fd|37.5}}% of the health drained during {{ai|Demonic Ascension|Swain}}, with the '''total''' damage {{ccs|capped|magic}}.
r2.descriptionHtml: Active: Swain releases a nova of energy, dealing a base amount of magic damage to all nearby enemies plus 37.5% of the health drained during Swain's Demonic Ascension, with the total damage Unknown value: ccs / capped / magic.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r2.notes:
* Manually casted ''Demon Flare'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** If ''Demon Flare'' triggers automatically, it will perform its effects without being considered an ability activation.
* ''Demon Flare'' passes through champions. Effects like {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} will block the portion of the nova they intercept.
* '''Swain''' can move during ''Demonflare's'' cast time.
* ''Demonflare'' will fire from wherever '''Swain''' is at the end of the cast time.
r2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 100,100,100 as 100
r2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '120,120,120' as '120'

• Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 100% AP)
